text: Mount Gilbert is a volcano which forms the northern part of Akun Island in the eastern Aleutian Islands, USA. Active fumaroles were documented 1 mi (1.5 km) northeast of the summit in the early 1900s. Map of Alaskan volcanoes, with Mount Gilbert marked. ==See also== *List of volcanoes in the United States of America ==Sources== * Volcanoes of the Alaska Peninsula and Aleutian Islands- Selected Photographs * Alaska Volcano Observatory Category:Volcanoes of Aleutians East Borough, Alaska Category:Mountains of Alaska Category:Volcanoes of Alaska Category:Aleutian Range Category:Mountains of Aleutians East Borough, Alaska
title: Mount Gilbert (Alaska)
